videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Mono black control never dies  Standard MTG Arena
videos.description:
Is there anything better than a Mono Black Control deck in Standard? No, not really, and Liliana of The Veil will always be the best Black planeswalker ever printed.  Enjoy this brew for BO1!

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/H4jnOA3r_0ig34qjql6c-g
